name: BubbleJag
description:
Destroy the incoming bubbles by launching the orbs with the matching colors.

Keyboard controls:

P - pause

Esc - return to main menu

A - launch red orb

S - launch green orb

D - launch blue orb

Mouse controls:

Swipe left - launch red orb

Swipe down - launch green orb

Swipe right - launch blue orb
